One day, Tim decided to tackle the most ambitious painting of his life. He took out all of his best colors and got to work.

The magical creature was very patient. It stood with Hannah until she figured out how to use the rub.

saw a big scary creature. But the creature didn't look too happy.
Jimmy asked, "What's wrong?".
The creature said, "I am trying to solve this difficult puzzle, but I just can't seem to do it".
Jimmy saw the puzzle and he could tell it was very tricky. He said, "Let me help you".
The creature was very grateful. He handed the rubber pieces to Jimmy. Jimmy thought and thought until he suddenly figured out how to put the puzzle together.
When he was done, the creature said, "Thank you! That was very difficult, but you did it!"

When the robot got closer, he saw that it was a tiny creature. The creature welcomed the robot and said they had been waiting a very long time to meet him. The robot was excited, but then the creature said they must leave right away. 
The robot was confused, but followed the creature until they arrived in a nearby town. There, the robot saw many other robots living together in harmony and peace. The tiny creature explained that the robots were celebrating the freedom their ancestors had won for them hundreds of years ago.

he ran to it. 
When he got there, Henry saw a dark creature. It was very tall, with two wings. It was holding a beautiful box. It said it had to deliver the box to Henry. Henry was excited!
 
But then suddenly the sky grew dark and the creature changed into a monster. It had sharp teeth and it growled. The monster snatched the box and flew away with it. Henry couldn't do anything. He was sad and scared. 
Henry never got the box, but he learned to never be too curious. He was careful never to go near gloomy squares again.

The creature smiled and said, "My name is Jim, and I'm very creative. I was trying to yield something wonderful out of this place".
The soldier looked impressed. He said, "That's amazing! I've never seen anything like it before". Then he said goodbye to Jim and headed off on his mission.
The soldier's experience made him realise that even in dark and scary places, people can still find creative things to do. Whenever he felt afraid, he remembered Jim and was thankful for being so brave.

Alice asked, "Are you the one who asked for the ball?". The fox nodded and smiled.
Alice gave the fox the ball and the fox thanked her. Together, they kicked the ball, up and down and around, until the sun went away.
Alice said goodbye to the fox and promised to come back soon. She left the wild woods happy, with a big smile on her face.

seemed friendly.
Frank was brave and decided to talk to the creature. "What is your name?", he asked. The creature said: "I am an alien and I don’t speak your language". Frank was so surprised and they became friends. Every day, they went to the forest and talked about the stars. 
But one day, the creature wasn’t there. Frank was sad because his new friend was gone, so he looked for him. He walked for hours but couldn’t find him. Suddenly, he heard a loud bang, like something had exploded. He was very scared and started to

inside.
The creature opened its mouth and a beautiful song filled the air. Tom was mesmerised by the sound and watched the creature dance in the water. Suddenly, the creature jumped out of the lake, splashing Tom with wet water. Tom giggled and ran away. 
The magical creature fluttered away with a smile, leaving Tom with a song that he'd never forget.

One day a magical creature appeared. It was called a 'permit'. This permit allowed the pick to do something special. The pick was now able to give the people something they wanted.
The people in the village were so excited. They had never seen anything like this before. They allowed the pick to give them what they wanted.
The pick granted everyone their wishes. Everyone was so happy, they laughed and cheered.
The mysterious pick and the permit had made everyone in the village very happy. They all thanked the magical creature for granting them their wishes.
